channel.title: [ Read ]
channel.description:
Why are people editing their servers for "Dragon smithing/items" , Max stat 115-1xx, Mini games, etc" ?
People liked playing RSC just the way it was , IMO; their is no need to be editing your servers with these stupid little "updates" to try and convince more players to play. RSC Was perfect the way it was, and would not need to be edited into "Diffrent colored PHats, or "Kalphite 2hander " etc.

item.title: [ Read ]
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:8, topic:280177”][quote author=ephemeral link=topic=370134.msg2797961#msg2797961 date=1243189598]

There will always be those people that try to ruin the game for others, recolored item’s, new minigames, etc. For those of you who say that nobody wants an exact RSC replica, your wrong, almost everybody does, because as of now only around what, 2000 people, have access to real RSC, so a private server is the only chance some of us have to expierence RSC.

What are you talking about? RSC died about 3 years ago; and there are people who have been playing RSC servers for ages, and they would want to play something other than a replica of RSC.
[/quote]

I was saying that there are around 2000 people left who can still play Jagex’s RSC, the real thing.[/quote]

2000? no… there is alot of more.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Read ]
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:21, topic:280177”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=370134.msg2798901#msg2798901 date=1243254692]

I think grab a dictionary, and read the word Replicate. RSCD and whatever all you guys are talking about is still very far from a ‘Replicate’, Sure a lot of content is there (and most of the important stuff) but it’s no replicate/clone.

Maybe you should look up “Replica”… Multiple bank pages do not belong in RSC F2P.

is that a joke? you can easily remove it yourselves if you have a problem with it…
[/quote]

He’s talking about rsca.[/quote]

oo i thought he meant in general

Read full topic

item.title: [ Read ]
item.dc:creator: @_the_don !the_don
item.description:
@_the_don wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:13, topic:280177”][quote author=!the_don link=topic=370134.msg2798300#msg2798300 date=1243208481]

I agree with what Powerslave said.

[center] I don’t.

Fake ephemeral is fake.

Fake Tewl is also fake

Of course, but I already stated that. I’m doing it to entertain Tewl’s failed efforts for attention, why use ephemeral’s alias?
[/quote]

Because it wasn’t taken by anyone else.

Also, I know exactly who you are, “!the_don”.[/quote]

Oh noes? Identity on this site is rather irrelevant.

Read full topic

item.title: [ Read ]
item.dc:creator: @salrathor1 salrathor1
item.description:
@salrathor1 wrote:

I kind of agree…

My RSC server is a replica of the old RSC before the wilderness was implemented which was PKING everywhere, its something different but something classic. However, i’m having a few VPS problems at the moment… lets hope they are resolved shortly.

  • Its pk everywhere ±8 combats.
  • Draynor Mannor is an open zone - any combat can fight
  • free trouts
  • smaller map
    – no wilderness etc.
  • no weapon requirements.

A few small changes… I didn’t do the coding - just the modifying.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

If every server resembled RSC then there would be nothing new to offer players.

Server A: Rsc replica 100 players

Server B: Rsc replica (new) 3 players

Server C: Rsc replica (new) 5 players

Hmm I wonder which one I will choose…such variety there…
